guides.title: How to Transfer Chase UR to Hyatt
steps: Log into Chase and open Ultimate Rewards
Select Hyatt from the partner list
tips: Only transfer when ready to book

guides.title: Checking ANA Award Availability
steps: Create a free ANA Mileage Club account
Search 355 days out for best availability
Book via Virgin Atlantic by phone
tips: ANA releases seats at schedule opening

guides.title: Calculating Welcome Bonus True Value
steps: List bonus points and estimated value
Estimate total value per dollar spent
Decide based on your travel goals
